alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 19 at 7:39PM CDT until May 20 at 3:28PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Topeka KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Neosho River Near Neosho Rapids affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Neosho River Near Neosho Rapids. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Low lying areas along the river flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 22.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 4.0 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/top/.
